abstractText: We propose to use a statistical based mark-recapture model consistent with our study design to estimate population abundance of predatory fish species within the sample frame.Our initial model is a Hierarchical Bayesian Model (HBM), which extends the previous HBM modeling framework to account for multiple strata within a year (Wyatt 2002, Wyatt 2003, Rivot et al. 2008, and Korman et al. 2016).Our HBM results in partial pooling, which may provide robust estimates and is a compromise between the extremes of complete pooling across sites and independent estimates for each site.
title: Develop Bayesian Hierarchical Abundance Model v1.0
